name: 陳匡正
objective: 本課程講授如何使用Westlaw International資料庫進行IP研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
schedule:
第一週 (106/9/11~106/9/17) Introduction; Writing the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Secondary Sources)
第二週 (106/9/18~106/9/24) Westlaw International Database Training
第三週 (106/9/25~106/10/1) Fundamentals of Legal Reasoning; Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Secondary Sources)
第四週 (106/10/2~106/10/8) The Process of Legal Research; Review the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Secondary Sources~Common Law); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Common Law)
第五週 (106/10/9~106/10/15) Introduction of the "Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation" (I); Writing the Sequence of Assignments #1 (State Statutes)
第六週 (106/10/16~106/10/22) Introduction of the "Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation" (II); Preview and Writing the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Federal Law); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #1 (State Statutes)
第七週 (106/10/23~106/10/29) Introduction of the "Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation" (III); Preview and Writing the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Administrative Law); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Federal Law)
第八週 (106/10/30~106/11/5) Introduction of the "Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation" (IV); Review the Sequence of Assignments #1 (State Statutes~Administrative Law); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #1 (Administrative Law)
第九週 (106/11/6~106/11/12) Introduction of the "Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation" (V)
第十週 (106/11/13~106/11/19) Preview and Writing the Sequence of Assignments #2 (State Statutes)
第十一週 (106/11/20~106/11/26) Overview of the U.S. Legal System
第十二週 (106/11/27~106/12/3) Preview and Writing the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Administrative Law); Review the Sequence of Assignments #2 (State Statutes~Federal Law)
第十三週 (106/12/4~106/12/10) Preview and Writing the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Secondary Sources); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Common Law)
第十四週 (106/12/11~106/12/17) Review the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Administrative Law); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Secondary Sources)
第十五週 (106/12/18~106/12/24) Review the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Secondary Sources); Hand in the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Common Law)
第十六週 (106/12/25~106/12/31) Review the Sequence of Assignments #2 (Common Law)
第十七週 (107/1/1~107/1/7) Review of the Course
第十八週 (107/1/8~107/1/14) Final Exam
scorePolicy:
1.平時課後作業 50%
2.上課出席 20%
3.期末考試 30%
materials:
1.McKinney, Ann Ruth & Childs, Scott, Legal Research: A Practical Guide and Self-Instructional Workbook (Thomson/West, 5th ed. 2008).
2.McKinney, Ann Ruth, Childs, Scott, Flanary-Smith, Amy, Legal Research Online: A Supplement to Accompany McKinney and Childs' Legal Research, Fifth Ed (Thomson/West, 5th ed. 2008).
3.The Bluebook: A Uniform System of Citation (The Harvard Law Review Association, 20th ed. 2015).
